pilots.name: Contracted Scout
pilots.text: Built for long-distance reconnaissance and plotting new hyperspace routes, the lightly armed JumpMaster 5000 is often extensively retrofitted with custom upgrades.

pilots.name: Dengar
pilots.caption: Vengeful Corellion
pilots.ability: After you defend, if the attacker is in your [Front], you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a bonus attack against the attacker.

pilots.name: Manaroo
pilots.caption: Graceful Aruzan
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. If you do, transfer all green tokens assigned to you to that ship.

pilots.name: Tel Trevura
pilots.caption: Escape Artist
pilots.ability: If you would be destroyed, you may discard 1 [Charge]. If you do, discard all of your damage cards, suffer 5 [hit] damage, and place yourself in reserves instead. At the start of the next Planning Phase, place yourself within range 1 of your player edge.
